Class HostelRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
      • HostelRoom

  • public class HostelRoom
extends Room
    This class simulates a room in a hostel

    • Field Summary

      Number of appliances in every hostel room.

      A boolean array representing the working condition/working state of 3 appliances present in every hostel room.

    • Field Detail

      • workingAppliances

        private boolean[] workingAppliances
        A boolean array representing the working condition/working state of 3 appliances present in every hostel room. Index 0 represents the working condition of a fan Index 1 represents the working condition of a tubelight Index 2 represents the working condition of a socket If the element is true, then the corresponding appliance is working. Not working otherwise

      • NUMBER_OF_APPLIANCES

        static int NUMBER_OF_APPLIANCES
        Number of appliances in every hostel room. There will be 3 appliances in each room.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HostelRoom

        public HostelRoom​(int length,
                  int breadth,
                  int height)
        Constructor for hostel room. Initialize the instance variables. By default all appliances do not work
        Parameters:
        length - An integer equal to the length of the room
        breadth - An integer equal to the breadth of the room
        height - An integer equal to the height of the room

    • Method Detail

      • setStateOfAppliances

        public void setStateOfAppliances​(java.lang.String state)
        This method accepts the working state of the appliances in the room as a String The String is in the following format "workingCondition0,workingCondition1,workingCondition2" where each of workingCondition0, workingCondition1, workingCondition2 is "true" or "false" Note that the case of any of the workingConditions need not be regular i.e. it could be, for instance, "trUe,FaLsE,TRUe" This method takes the string as an input and makes the requisite changes to the working state of the appliances
        Parameters:
        state - A comma-separated String representing the working state of appliances in the room in the order the appliances have been defined in the workingAppliances field detail

      • calculateMaintenanceCost

        public int calculateMaintenanceCost​()
        Calculates the maintenance cost of the hostel room according to the following conditions: The first part of the cost is the base cost of any room. Additionally: If the fan is not working, cost increases by 5 units If the tubelight is not working, cost increases by 3 units If the socket is not working, cost increases by 2 units
        Overrides:
        calculateMaintenanceCost in class Room
        Returns:
        an integer equal to the maintenance cost of the hostel room
